thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: Maryse Pursun-Surette
thread.title_full: Sammydress 的点评人 Maryse Pursun-Surette

author: Maryse Pursun-Surette
title: Maryse Pursun-Surette
text:
.
For my first order at Sammydress, I can say that it has been beyond my expectations. I received 13 items out of 14 till now. There has been some delay in the despatch but I was able to follow the itinery via tracking numbers. I mainly ordered dresses and tops. To my satisfaction, they all fit well and the materials are up to standard. The items reflect their advertisement.The customer service always keep contact and was courteous. For sure, I will order again.
